blocks.title: Spotify
blocks.content: Music Engine is a free online platform that offering playlist generation and data visualization of music listening statistics. All the data comes from the Spotify web api.

blocks.title: Playlist generation
blocks.content: The playlist generation uses the maximum of 5 tracks provided by the user to find similar tracks and generate a suitable playlist.

blocks.title: Data visualization
blocks.content: Music Engine offers several kinds of data visualization in order to provide to the user an easily readable and understandable overview of his music data. Among these graphs, we find the recent listens, the top artists and the top tracks.

generation.subtitle: Allows you to generate a playlist of 30 tracks from the selected tracks.

search.desc: Select up to 5 tracks that will be used to generate a playlist
search.info: Please select at least one track

likedTracks.title: Allows you to switch from liked tracks to your own playlists with a drag & drop system

topArtists.title: Your top 20 most listened artists filtered by period and classified by number of listenings.

topTracks.title: Your top 20 most listened tracks filtered by period and classified by number of listenings.

recentPlays.title: History of the last 50 tracks listened to and classification by artists present.
